DOC.brief_summary: Investigators use Solomon 4-group design test effectiveness brief intervention promote health behavior homeless youth 18-23 year age . We recruit 300 youth Austin , TX 300 Columbus , OH . We gather quantitative data health behavior life satisfaction 3 6 month follow intervention , deliver individual basis . Data analyze use structural equation model ANCOVA statistic .
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Promote Healthy Behaviors Homeless Youth
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim proposal : 1. determine effectiveness self-reflective preventive intervention promote responsible substance use safe sex behavior ( prevent HIV/AIDS ) homeless youth , ages18-23 year ; 2. determine whether psychological capital factor mediate relationship background risk factor ( sexual orientation , duration homelessness , sex abuse history , history substance use , past sexual risk behavior , service utilization ) improve proximal outcome ( self-efficacy intention ) distal outcome ( responsible substance use , safe sex , life satisfaction ) ; 3. determine effect pre-testing intervention proximal outcome ( immediately follow intervention ) distal outcome ( interval 3 6 month follow intervention ) ; exploratory aim 4. explore general specific difference proximal distal outcome intervention participant two geographically different site ( Austin , TX Columbus , OH ) . We recruit total 600 homeless youth 2 drop-in center 2 geographic area central US : Austin , TX Columbus , OH . Using Solomon four-group design repeat measure , conduct randomize controlled trial brief possible self intervention ( PSI ) consist 6 brief individualized session focus generate image one 's possible self fear best . Intervention participant also receive weekly electronic message encourage move toward goal become best possible self . Quantitative data collect , immediately intervention , interval 3 6 month follow intervention test hypotheses effectiveness intervention health behavior life satisfaction well effect pre-testing outcome use structural equation model ANCOVA statistic . The finding expect public health impact development individualize service promote healthy behavior , healthy lifestyle life satisfaction vulnerable youth .
DOC.criteria: current secure place residence , receive service homeless street outreach center , able read write English Currently enrol Alcoholics Anonymous substance treatment program
